name: bwa
title: BWA
summary: Maps reads to a reference genome using the Burrows-Wheeler Aligner

inputSpec.name: reads
inputSpec.label: Reads
inputSpec.help: One or more Reads table objects that will be mapped to the reference genome.

inputSpec.name: output_name
inputSpec.label: Output name
inputSpec.help: The name of the resulting Mappings table object (optional; if not provided, the name will be based on the Reads name).

inputSpec.name: reference
inputSpec.label: Reference genome
inputSpec.help: The genome that the reads will be mapped against. (If this genome is not indexed for BWA, the app will automatically index it and include an indexed version in the output, for future use). DNAnexus provides several pre-indexed genomes in the 'Reference Genomes' public project.

inputSpec.name: algorithm
inputSpec.label: Mapping algorithm
inputSpec.help: The mapping algorithm to use. Possible values are 'aln', 'bwasw' or 'auto'. See the app page for more information.

inputSpec.name: chunk_size
inputSpec.label: Reads per chunk
inputSpec.help: This app parallelizes itself by dividing the input into chunks of a certain size (a certain number of reads), and mapping each chunk individually. Lower chunk sizes lead to higher levels of parallelization, reducing the wall-clock time that one has to wait for the app to finish. However, lower chunks sizes may also increase the cost of running the app in the cloud, as they lead to a higher number of chunks, each of which adds a constant processing overhead. The default value is 25 million reads per chunk; DNAnexus suggests caution when experimenting with this parameter.

inputSpec.name: discard_unmapped_rows
inputSpec.label: Discard unmapped rows?
inputSpec.help: If selected, unmapped reads will not be included in the Mappings output.

outputSpec.name: mappings
outputSpec.label: Mappings
outputSpec.help: The resulting Mappings table object. (Developers can look at http://wiki.dnanexus.com/Types/Mappings for more information).

outputSpec.name: indexed_reference
outputSpec.label: Indexed reference genome
outputSpec.help: An indexed version of the reference genome, for future use as input to this app.
